name: quark

quark noun [C]
(PHYSICS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
physics
  specialized one of the most basic forms of matter that make up the heavier elementary particles: Atoms are made up of smaller particles - protons, neutrons and electrons - some of which are made up of even smaller ones, called quarks.
